import React from 'react'; import $ from "jquery"; import Map from "../../components/Map/Map"; function TeachersInfo(props) { const teachersInfo = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("teachersPodData")); var sel_teach = props.match.params.tinfo; var selectedTeacher = {}; $.each(teachersInfo, function (k, v) { if(sel_teach == v.name){ return selectedTeacher = v; } }); console.log(selectedTeacher); return( <>

Give your child the best in early education and care

Give your child the best in early education and care

Previous Next

{sel_teach}

{selectedTeacher.address1}

{selectedTeacher.email}

Schedule a tour

Contact

Email:{selectedTeacher.email}

) } export default TeachersInfo;
